name: Dandy Day Bench
description: The Dandy Day Bench is the ultimate luxury seating piece. Available in other finishes. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KLOV01. Handmade. Antique Natural Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Although inspired by her parents, Kifu's collection features Home Accessories and Furniture with a distinct identity of its own, using elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, interpreted in a quirkier way reflecting her youth.
